text: RTV 7 Tuzla is a local Bosnian public cable television channel based in city of Tuzla. It was established in 2012. RTV 7 broadcasts a variety of programs such as local news, local sports, mosaic and documentaries. The programming is mainly produced in the Bosnian language. Radio 7 is also part of public municipality services. == References == == External links == * Official website of RTV 7 Tuzla * Communications Regulatory Agency of Bosnia and Herzegovina Category:Television channels and stations established in 2012 Category:Television stations in Bosnia and Herzegovina
title: RTV 7 Tuzla
